snippet: The paraphrased quote, “I was a drum major for peace, justice and righteousness,” has been criticized since the monument to the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. opened last year.
abstract: Controversial inscription on Washington memorial honoring civil rights leader Rev Dr Martin Luther King Jr will be removed; paraphrased quote, 'I was a drum major for peace, justice and righteousness,' has drawn criticism since monument's 2011 opening for being incomplete and not properly representing King's character.
lead_paragraph: The paraphrased quote, “I was a drum major for peace, justice and righteousness,” has been criticized since the monument to the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. opened last year.

headline.seo: Officials Removing Quote From King Memorial
headline.main: In Response to Criticism, Officials to Remove Quote From Memorial to King
headline.print_headline: In Response to Criticism, Officials to Remove Quote From Memorial to King
